roleset.name: look at steadily
roleset.note: GAZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gaze' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 30.3, Framenet entry Perception active. (from gaze.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gaze-v: with directional
example.text: The lucky ones gaze out at life with serene eyes and smile with a face of innocence at their perfumed happiness.
